name: Windstorm: Start of a Great Friendship - Remastered
description: Rediscover the breathtaking world of Windstorm, based on the established film and book series, Ostwind! Delve into the fascinating story of Mika, a girl known as a horse whisperer, as she befriends the majestic black stallion called Windstorm – with fully updated graphics and a new photo mode!

name: District Panic
description: an action-packed arcade shooter that takes you deep into the heart of a computer under siege.You're the system's last line of defense.

name: Last Chance: The Survivor
description: Last Chance: The Survivor is a VR-based action-shooter game that chronicles the gripping journey of Gabriel, starting as a scientist in an army laboratory and continuing as a father searching for his daughter in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Peaches and Dreams
description: A turn-based rpg about overcoming emotional abuse and the monsters that find homes in your mind.

name: Critterball Derby
description: Create and manage your own team, and play ball against your rivals in normal or ranked play. Tight controls and a smooth learning curve will have you knocking it out of the park in no time in this arcade baseball simulator. Or challenge your skills with difficult homerun challenges.

name: Hiiro no Kakera Tamayori-hime Kitan: Omoi Iro no Kioku for Nintendo Switch
description:
Port of the PS vita version, with additional content from the PS3 version.

Hiiro no Kakera Tamayori-hime Kitan: Omoi Iro no Kioku is a bundle of Hiiro no Kakera and it's fandisc, Hiiro no Kakera: Ano Sora no Shita de.

name: Chromatic Memories
description: A visual novel about grief, memory and acceptance. Nayara is a painter of memories: she digs into her clients’ minds to change or even erase their memories. One day she realizes she has altered her own memory. What was so painful or unbearable that she wanted to forget it for good?

name: Magic Caster
description: Dive into a fast-paced wizard world where drawing gestures becomes your power! Defeat monsters, unleash potent spells, and expertly navigate the bullet hell to experience a new level of gaming excitement.

name: HexoCity
description: Build a futuristic city on a lush archipelago, personalizing each step with unique tiles. Strategize for high scores in this serene city-builder.

name: DeepWeb Simulator
description: DeepWeb Simulator is a simulation game where you will get lost in the dark corridors and experience the thrill of illegal trade. Place ads, make secret deals and build your criminal empire in the illegal world of the deep web.

name: Shrot
description: Shrot is a bite-sized old-school action RTS set on a sandy planet with horses, tractors and techno music.

name: Pandarunium
description: Team up with friends in this top-down stealth-runner game to get to Rock n' Roll paradise. Use grit, abilities, and your friends to make it through the hordes of enemies.

name: Astrodelia
description: Astrodelia, an explosion of colors and shapes inspired by Science Fiction of all time. Psychedelic space adventure with an evocative original soundtrack: test your ingenuity and skill, overcome puzzles and mazes, think outside the box to save the Solar System.

name: Tokyo Mafia Simulator
description: Tokyo Mafia Simulator is an simulation action-adventure game where you experience the thrilling and dangerous life of a yakuza in Tokyo. You can extort, steal, hit, protect, date, and more, as you rise through the ranks of the underworld.

name: Bureau of Contacts
description: Bureau of Contacts is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players where you confront insidious ghosts and the paranormal controlled by advanced generative AI technologies.

name: Shoomer Booter
description: An unexpected find at an antique shop, a soy boy stumbles upon an ancient beard ointment. Each night, he slips into a dream where he embodies a Sumerian warrior, tracing his lineage to Gibil. In this fantastical realm, he courageously confronts demons that lurk within the mystical attics of Irkalla.

name: Whiteout Frontier
description: In this turn based, survival focused Tactical SRPG, you must defend locations from dynamic and intelligent enemy groups wishing to destroy the town for their own survival. Hang out and bond with your crew as you defend and save what you can as everything slips into chaos. Every choice matters.

name: Fire Thief
description: Twin-stick action fire fighting game. Extinguish fires, rescue citizens, and protect property... at least until you steal it. Sneak past other fire fighters and police to sell your stolen loot while trying to keep the fire under control.

name: Skillwood
description: Skillwood is a survival simulator highlighting resource foraging. Chop trees, mine stones, and skillfully level up your abilities to upgrade buildings with the gathered resources. Go through the continous progression by unlocking more areas and buildings

name: Where Ferrets
description: Search for 100 Ferrets. A carefully hand drawn 4K scene filled with cute characters. The process is short and won't take up too much player time. You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players. Extremely easy to achieve.

name: X4: Timelines
description: An expansion to a 2018 sandbox space simulator. X4: Timelines introduces various scenarios and many unlockable rewards.

name: Playtown 2
description: Playtown 2 is a first person adventure horror game that takes place inside an indoor children's playground. Continue the journey to uncover the mysteries filled with challenging puzzles and deadlier enemies. This time .. you won't survive, as Hump-tump is not someone that takes kindly to strangers.

name: Fantasy Village Simulator
description: Experience building your own village with different races in a fantasy world! Produce more villagers for various production tasks and train more guards to resist waves of demonic attacks. Plan the production of supplies to create more powerful equipment for the guards to wear.

name: Redneg AllStars Swing-By Edition
description: From the developer of Cosmo Dreamer and Like Dreamer, "Outside", this is a fantastical and comical boss-rush bullet-hell shooting game remade from a free game. Both beginners and experts can enjoy the intense boss rush!

name: Project Vroom Vroom Prototype
description: Construct vehicles by cleverly combining building blocks and mechanical parts to perfectly transmit the power from your engine to the road. Start your voyage of discovery or compete with the creations of your friends.

name: Bubble Chicken Farm
description: Bubble Chicken Farm offers an immersive game experience where adventure, farm management, and magic merge to create a world full of possibilities. Discover the joy of being a pirate farmer and create your own legend at Bubble Chicken Farm.

name: Galactic Civilizations IV: Species Pack
description: The Species Pack for Galactic Civilizations IV expands the game into the entire Milky Way via Subspace Streams. Featuring over a dozen unique species with new technologies and world-building aspects, it enhances gameplay and strategy.

name: Aarik: and the Ruined Kingdom
description: Aarik (and the ruined kingdom) is a perspective based puzzle game centred around a Prince trying desperately to repair his father's kingdom. Using a magical crown Aarik must grab, roll, move and mend to save his homeland and his family.

name: Vanity
description: Immerse yourself in a world of frenetic action where Vanity offers you several thrilling game modes in PvP and PvE.

name: Asteroids ++
description: Asteroids ++ is the best Asteroids clone you will ever play in your life. Customize your spaceship with your weapon loadout, save your solar system, and destroy those damn Asteroids! And remember, you can never end Asteroid genocide!

name: Fair and Square
description: Fair and Square is a fast paced real time strategy where you will need to defend your base against multiple waves or battle opponents. Play with or against friends chosing not one faction but a combination of factions.

name: Uncult
description: 'Uncult' is a pixel RPG where the protagonist, the daughter of a cult leader, suffers from amnesia after an accident in a fanatical pseudo-religious group. Now, she must piece together her obscured past, facing numerous challenges and uncovering the truth. Your decisions will shape her destiny.

name: Love & Country
description: A World War I historical romance-spy thriller visual novel with meaningful choices.

name: CosmoPirates
description: CosmoPirates takes the card battling, deck building genre to the final frontier of cartoonish comedy in the endless, colorful space! Explore the galaxy, chose your battles, grow your forces and build your ultimate deck to take on the dreaded CosmoPirates overlord... and take their place!

name: This Grand Life 2
description: A money-focused life simulator. Create characters with allergies and addictions. Manage their lives through financial booms and busts. Advance their careers, start a small business, invest in real estate and stocks - or roleplay a penniless hobo.

name: College Bowl
description: College Bowl is a beautifully pixelated on-field simulation of American Football! Challenge college rivals on your way to winning a National title! Take on various game modes, including a deep Dynasty mode with in-depth recruiting, scouting, stat tracking, ranking, bowl games, yearly goals and more!

name: Crab God
description: Crab God is an atmospheric underwater god game where you must restore the environment to sustain your children. Build beautiful coral reefs, grow your crabby religion, and explore a hostile yet beautiful ocean world. Can you protect your children and raise the next generation of ocean guardians?

name: Tower Song
description: Tower Song is a turn-based JRPG/strategy RPG hybrid. Choose your hero, customize your party's skills and gear, and hone strategies to defeat challenging enemies in this narrative-led adventure.

name: Tavern Talk
description: Listen to stories of boasting glory and utter failure. Gather rumors, turn them into quests, and send the next adventurer on a journey that may change their life forever. Play the tavern owner, serve your drinks, and save the day! And while you’re at it why not uncover truths about a looming evil?

name: Aska
description:
Lay claim to unspoiled lands and pave the way for a fierce Viking tribe. Craft the ultimate settlement solo or together with up to x3 friends. Trust in the Gods and the power of the Eye of Odin and summon intelligent NPC villagers to provide camaraderie and relief from the toils of survival.

In ASKA, strive to build a self-sustaining Viking tribe, working, crafting, hunting and fighting together. Command and organize intelligent NPC villagers, working and fighting alongside them.

name: Drug Dealer Simulator 2
description: What turns a person into a drug dealer? A drug dealer into a drug lord? Find out in DDS2, a first-person sim set in a dynamic open world. Make contacts, cook drugs, and manage your cartel on Isla Sombra, where power is the only law.

name: Odyssey of Dremid'ir
description: Decaying without its god-like creators, the world of Dremid'ir is poised on the brink of destruction, explore a world filled with ancient ruins and lost civilizations, as a small group of unbeknownst heroes find a way to save themselves from the savage wastelands that surround them.

name: Zenless Zone Zero
description: Zenless Zone Zero is an all-new 3D action game from HoYoverse, here to provide a thrilling combat experience. Build a squad of up to three and begin your assault with Basic and Special Attacks. Dodge and Parry to neutralize your opponents' counterattacks, and when they're Stunned, unleash a powerful combo of Chain Attacks to finish them off! Remember, different opponents have different traits, and it would be prudent to use their weaknesses to your advantage.

name: Histera
description: Histera is a free-to-play, rapid-fire multiplayer shooter featuring dynamic deathmatch arenas that transform as you fight! Histera propels the FPS genre into the future with our ‘Glitch’ mechanic that procedurally re-generates maps during matches, delivering unpredictable, feverish combat.

name: Bishojo Battlefield
description: Bishojo Battlefield is a game made for iOS and Android.

name: Everafter Falls
description: Rediscover your life on Everafter Falls. Farm, fish, craft, and fight to restore the peace in an all new farming adventure. Features split-screen coop, a pet with useful skills, drones, resource-harvesting pixies, a card eating progression system, dungeons to explore and much more!

name: Workers & Resources: Soviet Republic
description: Workers & Resources: Soviet Republic is the ultimate real-time soviet-themed city builder tycoon game. Construct your own republic and transform a poor country into a rich industrial superpower!

name: Naomi Clicker: Premium DLC
description: Play the premium map ‘Seasons'!

name: Everspace 2: Alienware Ship Skin
description: Download this DLC for a free Alienware ship skin in EVERSPACE 2.

name: Into the Emberlands: Supporter Pack
description:
For all those who want to go the extra mile to support the developers of Into the Emberlands, the supporter pack offers a collection of bonus content.
Three skins for the Lightbearer: The Stubborn, The Determined, The Fanatic
A mysterious pet: The flying Platypus
The original soundtrack: Brighten your mood with the nine wholesome tracks of Into the Emberlands
The digital Artbook

name: Idle Champions: Wyrm Slayer Korth Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Korth (if you don't already own them) Wyrm Slayer Korth Skin An Epic Feat for Korth 7 Gold Korth Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Wyrm Slayer Nova Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Nova (if you don't already own them) Wyrm Slayer Nova Skin An Epic Feat for Nova 7 Gold Nova Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Submarines
description: Submarines DLC gets you a new challenge awaiting you. Submarines, which bring many new challenges and possibilities! Get ready to smash some Submarines!

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KDTW Airport
description: Michingan's busiest airport - KDTW arrives to Tower! Simulator 3 - the primary international airport serving Detroit with six runways, two terminals, and 4 concourses with a total of 147 gates keeping you busy controlling!

name: Raceborn
description: Raceborn is a racing game featuring miniature cars in diverse locations with extensive vehicle customization options. Win races, earn upgrades, and showcase your creativity to become a racing legend.

name: Shattered Melodies
description: Slash and shred your way through the vibrant, musical world of Soronos. Summon all your rhythm, dexterity, and puzzle solving chops to beat down the fool that nabbed your little sister!

name: Little Fish Swims On
description: Little Fish Swims is a relaxing and enjoyable idle game with a casual simulated fish tank located at the top of the screen. There are over a thousand types of fish in the game, and you can customize your own fish tank and background skin style.

name: The Woods Have Horns
description:
Welcome to Camp Shelterlake! Enjoy a beautiful view, take a walk on the woods, and don't be brutally mauled by the legendary Goatman!

Do you have what it takes to survive this pixel-art gorefest?

name: Star Conflict: Yith'Mor - Weapons of Victory
description: This pack includes:Weapon “Yith'Orm weapon” R11-17Active module “Guiding crystal” R13-17Modifier “Crystal combat recuperator” R13-17500 xenocrystals60 monocrystalsA set of resources for 50 ores: (Vanadium + Silicon + Graphite + Osmium) + 50 Crystal shards.

name: Cataclysm
description: A very small map based around the detailing of e2m1 and other episode 2 maps.

name: Teardown: Folkrace
description:
You’ve been invited to compete in the local folkrace. Can you successfully diversify your business ventures into the world of demolition racing?

Folkrace is a single-player campaign expansion that introduces a ton of new vehicles and a series of destructive racing game modes against computer-controlled opponents. Test your mettle on the track against rival drivers and expand your car collection as you win championships.

name: Restock
description: It's the night shift and you're late. AGAIN. Hurry up and finish your tasks before the manager gets his hands on you.

name: Fate/Samurai Remnant: Additional Episode 3 - Record's Fragment: Bailong and the Crimson Demon
description:
Mysteriously disappearing children. Rumors of evil spirits in Yoshiwara.
A strange voice calling out to Miyamoto Iori. A suddenly attacking bird monster.

In the midst of all these strange incidents, Yui Shousetsu appears in the form of a child and declares that if nothing is done, Edo will be destroyed.

With the Spirit Font in turmoil, aspirants of the Waxing Moon join together to face a new anomaly.

Among them is a newly arrived Servant, an unrivaled spear-wielder, Rogue Rider Zhao Yun.
“Feel the sting of Zhao Zilong's spear!”

name: Moonstone Island: Decorator's Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Moonstone Island: Decor Galor DLC Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Moonstone Island: Cozy Comforts DLC Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Moonstone Island: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: War Thunder: T-80U-E1 Bundle
War Thunder: Leopard 2A4M CAN Bundle
Goat Simulator 3: Multiversal Traveler's Edition
description: This bundle includes the base game of Goat Simulator 3 and the Multiverse of Nonsense DLC.

name: Steam Spire Chronicles
description: Steam Spire Chronicles is a combo-focused action roguelike set in a fantasy steampunk universe. Fight your way through an ever-changing labyrinth against creatures and automatons alike, picking up unique items that can change how you play!

name: Quescaper
description: You were thrown into a dungeon with the undead and only a sword was left for defense. Can you get through this underground maze and survive?

name: Keyboard Tennis
description: Keyboard Tennis, a keyboard-based tennis game, offers both fun and competitive experiences. Players aim to swiftly and accurately return the ball to their opponent using keyboard keys, requiring fast reflexes and precise timing.

name: Etera
description:
Immerse yourself in a boundless adventure at the heart of 'Etera,' an extraordinary journey through an imaginary world.

Explore scenarios rich in detail and complexity, where the thin line between reality and fantasy dissolves. Navigate through environments so realistic they seem tangible, yet surreal enough to capture your imagination with a unique blend of familiar and unexpected elements.

Every moment will mark the pace of your quest, influencing the plot and direction of your journey. Face challenges in a mutable timeline, where the past and the future intertwine.

Indulge in the luxury of experiencing the magic of never-before-seen worlds, where climatic adversities become either a precious ally or a insidious adversary.

name: Love Island
description: Tired of the hustle and bustle? Take a tour to Love Island! Play this match-three game with RPG elements to seduce all those charming anime girls!

name: House Builder: Medieval
description:
"House Builder: Medieval" DLC for the game House Builder on Steam allows you to explore medieval construction. Here are the details of the three new houses you can create:

1. Water Mill House: The first mills were built around 1 B.C. They were equipped with a water wheel used to grind cereals and produce flour and grains. At this DLC level, you can move into a medieval mill and become a miller!

2. Blacksmith's House: Blacksmiths were important professionals in the Middle Ages. They made horseshoes for horses and also produced barrels, nails, and other useful tools. With the DLC, you can feel like a medieval blacksmith and build your own house, including a workshop.

3. Windmill House: Windmills, powered by wind, were used to grind grains. They were invented in the ninth century in Eastern Persia and spread to England and the Netherlands. At the DLC level, you'll construct a wooden windmill, which will also serve as your home!

name: Natsu-Mon: 20th Century Summer Kid: Broadcast Over Sunset
description: This is paid downloadable content for Natsu-Mon: 20th Century Summer Kid, featuring a brand new area to explore and new events to experience.

name: Butto Bird
description:
Aerial battle action game that allows up to four players to enjoy the exhilarating experience of flying freely through the sky with a charming and lovable “bird” equipped with a powerful “jetpack.”

The game’s unique combination of cute and hardcore elements creates a thrilling and entertaining gameplay experience.

With simple controls, both beginners and advanced players can enjoy intense aerial battles together.

name: For Whom the Stars Shine
description: "Some stories are best told to none," she whispered. Long ago, the stars disappeared. Then, a man returned them. Few would believe such a thing; fewer still can recall how he bent heaven's ear. However, you won't find the tale in books or archives—only in the hearts of those who were there.

name: Nonogram Animals
description: Use your logic to paint beautiful images in this relaxing puzzle. The gorgeous visuals and relaxing soundtrack will help you forget all your problems and have a great time!

name: Poopy Time
description: Sin descripción

name: Riders Republic: Season 11
description: Sin descripción

name: Goat Simulator 3: Multiverse of Nonsense
description: In a world where everything went wrong (and it was all your fault) you must now help the guardian of the Multiverse to save it before it’s too late. This is… Goat Simulator 3: Multiverse of Nonsense

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Farewell, Penacony
description:
Version 2.3 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Firefly and Jade
• New Trailblaze mission: Farewell, Penacony
• New area: The Radiant Feldspar
• New gameplay modes: Divergent Universe and Apocalyptic Shadow
• New quality of life updates
• New main event: Origami Bird Clash
• …and more!

name: Dragon's Chronicles
description: This game is for maniacs who are no longer satisfied with the conventional difficulty level.

name: Hazardous island
description: It is an adventure first-person shooter with an open world and RPG elements. Created by one person

name: Farm Chores
description: Farm chores is a 3D FPV item search game, where you find yourself on a mysterious farm, surrounded by lush green fields and ancient trees. Your goal is to escape, but the path to freedom is not so simple. Your task is to collect keys, notes, and food to overcome all obstacles and break free.

name: Unity-chan the SharpShooter!
description: A casual sports TPS that can be played using only the mouse! Let's try clay pigeon shooting, rifle shooting, and rail shooting with Unity-chan!

name: Drag and Drop Medieval
description: Drag and Drop Medieval is a medieval-themed puzzle game where you move characters with your mouse through over 20 challenging levels featuring unique mechanics and pixel art graphics.

name: Happy Souls
description: Happy Souls is an action Metroidvania with puzzle elements reminiscent of old Zelda games. Navigate through two worlds filled with challenging puzzles, fearsome traps, and majestic enemies. Collect keys to advance and defeat the great dark evil lurking in hell.

name: Jam Jump
description: Jam Jump is an action-platformer adventure where you guide a young knight through challenging trials, battling hordes of enemies, and navigating treacherous islands with agility and skill.

name: Bump
description: Engage in fast-paced cyberpunk multiplayer arena combat. Utilize normal/charged shots, jumps, dashes, bullet time, and wall climbing for strategic advantage to push your enemies out of the arena and win the game.

name: Echo Generation: Midnight Edition
description: Lead a gang of kids to uncover spooky mysteries, battle creatures, and explore the supernatural side of your hometown in Echo Generation, a turn-based adventure set in the 90s. Echo Generation: Midnight Edition adds fast travel, quest tracker, refined combat mechanics, and more.

name: Everchained
description: Defeat bosses & harvest trinkets. Feed it shards & get fed upgrades. For it is your Master! Rise and follow the path, Soul of the Great Hero...

name: GooGooRise
description: Reaching the top is just the beginning. Don't fear failure; you can always start over. Climb upwards with all you've got!

name: Too Late Forest
description: "Too Late Forest" is a belt-scrolling adventure game in which a boy navigates his way through a mysterious forest. The deeper the boy goes into the forest, the more his body gradually transforms into a beast, and by turning back at any time, the ending will branch out.Can you lead him to happiness?

name: Get Up In The Night
description: "Get Up In The Night" tells a sci-fi story set in the future, filled with dark humor. An old man wakes up in a completely unfamiliar place... His bladder can no longer hold, and he must rush to the bathroom! But what exactly is going on? What secrets are hidden within all this?

name: Dimension Pirates
description: Here is the ultimate, third-person bullet hell game. Help save the universe and humanity by blasting away a wide array of villains that are trying to take over multiple dimensions.

name: Arbor
description: Become an pioneer, overcome crises and colonize the island.

name: The Mythical City 2
description: Protect your city from evil!

name: Brainwave Trials
description: Brainwave Trials presents itself as a first-person puzzle-platformer experience where the player takes the role of a volunteer within the Garnet Research And Development Sector. By utilizing parkour mechanics and dimensional manipulation, the player will be able to overcome the trials of science.

name: The Battle of Aurinoxia
description: A retro space shoot 'em up with pixel art graphics, unique enemies, tough angry bosses, and a killer soundtrack. You are among the first pilots to arrive in the system to mount the counteroffensive against the aggressors. Get out there and show these aliens the price for messing with The Alliance!

name: CrossCraze
description: A fun, modern twist on the classic word game, designed for players who prefer the challenge of a computer opponent (you can also pass-and-play offline with a friend). Place your letters on the board to build crosswords. Use bonus squares to boost your score and take your word play to another level.

name: Naomi Clicker
description: Naomi Clicker is a simple illustration collecting game. Click on Naomi and collect & combine items to collect Naomi’s illustrations!

name: Controlled Death
description: Multiplayer fps game. With many features, and maps.

name: Glyphs of Gitzan
description: Explore mysterious ruins and uncover their secrets by mastering the glowing glyphs!

name: Aquarist: Japanese Garden
description: Japanese Garden DLC is all that you love Aquarist for and so much more. The largest and most beautiful location comes with a plethora of new fish, decorations️, plants, and other interesting additions. Get it and start your aquarist relax in Japanese style.

name: Grapplers: Relic Rivals
description: Engage in fast-paced local PvP matches while unearthing ancient relics and harnessing their power to conquer your rivals. Dodge deadly traps, utilize your grappling hook, activate mystical runes, and master each relic to defeat your opponents and reign victorious in this thrilling PvP platformer!

name: Hidden Corgi Mansion
description: Hidden Corgi Mansion is a relaxing hidden object game. Explore an abandoned mansion in search of cute corgi puppies and collect toys so they have something to play with. Woof, woof!

name: PegIdle
description: PegIdle is a peggle idle game! Destroy thousands of pegs by dropping thousands of balls. Purchase auto drop which will drop balls for you! Score points by hitting pegs, clearing the board and being dropped into the pit!

name: Sauna of The Dead
description: Sauna of the DEAD is an action RPG where you become a wave master, swinging your towel to blast hot air at zombies and demons in the saunas of the underworld, sending them to ascend. Power up with sauna goods and drinks to blast the underworld's inhabitants into ascension.

name: Neural Shock
description: In Neural Shock, you must cleanse the world of horrid and bloodthirsty creatures by utilizing turrets, traps, wits and weapons. Choose from different class choices with unique playstyles and over 20+ different turrets and traps in this unique sci-fi Tower Defense / Action RPG.

name: Astrodle
description: A colorful, undemanding, idle shooter. Collect the essences of the 12 Zodiac Signs to ascend amongst them.

name: Letter Lancers
description: A 4-player couch co-op rogue-lite bullet-hell that will have you and your friends laughing your way through epic battles! Grab your friends, pick your characters, and get ready to ruin someone's day! Level up, select from hundreds of modifiers, get loot, and earn your place on the leaderboards!

name: There's No Dinosaurs 2
description: We are back with “There’s No Dinosaurs 2” - a relaxing hidden object point & click game in which your objective is to locate randomly placed dinosaurs amongst nine brand new cozy environments with beautifully hand-drawn graphics. Can you find all the dinosaurs?🦖

name: Two Souls
description: Two Souls is a gripping 2D platformer that pushes the boundaries of skill and precision. Immerse yourself in a world, offering an intense and challenging gaming experience. Prepare to face the ultimate platforming challenge!

name: DSS war party
description: Realtime medieval warfare

name: Shinobi Saga
description: Shinobi Saga is a one-life mini RPG with roguelite elements and interactive turn-based combat. Choose your Ninja team and embark on a journey into the wilderness to defeat evil spirits and save your village.

name: Looped
description: Looped is a short interactive story that lasts around 30 minutes. You will help Him and Her to progress by solving mini-puzzles and clicking your way forward the Chapters. It's a short, peaceful story about love that's perfect to enjoy when you need a break.

name: Republic of Pirates
description: Establish and grow a pirate utopia during the Golden Age of Piracy. Create a resource-based economy, engage in real-time naval combat, and navigate diplomatic relationships with rival powers. Explore the far reaches of the Caribbean in search of the ultimate fortune and glory…

name: Mio and the Hot Summer
description: This is an FPS where you fight fire monsters with water guns! Take on the Burning King as the cute sea goddess "Mio".

name: Facehand
description: Facehand is a synergy-driven roguelike deckbuilder with autobattling mechanics. Craft the perfect deck and chain card abilities to create wild combos!

name: Scars of Mars
description: Scars of Mars is a new real-time RPG. During combat and exploration, time flows, so you must make split-second decisions, execute precise commands swiftly, and vanquish enemies within a limited time. It's a thrilling experience that captures the unique tension and satisfaction of the gameplay.

name: Femboy Aim Trainer
description: Now you can train your aim with femboys. Enjoy and relax while shooting femboys!

name: Let Him Cook
description: Let Him Cook is a top-down action roguelite where you play as a food industry professional fighting in bullet hell's kitchen. When food fights back, you gotta cook. Jam to the music, hire assistants, and face against all kinds of live food puns!

name: Chained Together
description: From the depths of hell, climb chained to your friends through diverse worlds. Solo or co-op, try to reach the summit and discover what awaits you there...

name: Sky Escort
description: Sky Escort is a rouge-like card game featuring TD and management. Players roleplay an airborne mercenary,escorting clients' cargo to earn rewards. Buildcard decks, recruit crew members, and customize arms to enrich gameplay. Multiple factions can be chose from, each with unique combat style.

name: Bullet
description: Bullet is a top down Action Arcade game. You have one shot at killing your enemies. Dodge and weave through each level, gain points and upgrade your abilities. You have one shot... Make it count.

name: Andarin Weppes
description: A first person puzzle experience of someone with advancing dementia...

name: While Waiting My Turn
description: Discover the joy of building tiny structures with board game pieces in this relaxing game. Stack and create unique buildings. Complete optional tasks that fuel your creativity. Construct whatever you want – no puzzles to solve, no races to win.

name: My Horse: Bonded Spirits
description: Build a bond with your horse and gain its trust. Develop yours and the horse’s skills. Discover the surrounding open world. Complete tasks and take part in competitions. Rebuild a run-down stud farm!

name: Taoism
description: Taoism is a Roguelike card game with unique playing methods. Use the cards embodied in faith to explore the foggy Luonan country, and use the unique rules "Hunyuan" and "Qixiang" to uncover the truth behind the undercurrent with the protagonists in a huge conspiracy about people, Taoism and ghosts.

name: Viking Survivors
description: Viking Survivors is an action roguelite where you slay hordes of creatures while learning powerful skills to enhance your warrior. Unlock new characters, weapons and abilities. Design the most broken build and slay your enemies before they surround you!

name: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation - Quest of Memories
description: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation - Quest of Memories is an upcoming RPG based on the fantasy light novel series Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation, developed by Lancarse and published by Bushiroad Games.

name: The Black Pool
description: In the forest outside of town, four friends discover a mysterious black pool that transports them to an unknown world. To fight their way home, they must unlock and master supernatural abilities. Play cooperative or solo in this high-paced action game of skill that varies each session.

name: Snow Plowing Simulator
description: Nobody likes winter when they get up in the morning and have to clear snow in the entire neighborhood. What if we tell you that clearing snow can be relaxing? Just real snow chill! PS. Persistent ones will learn about the fascinating history of a sleepy town lost somewhere in the high mountains...

name: Omega Warp
description: Omega Warp is a 2D sci-fi themed action-adventure, which takes place aboard an interstellar freighter. Explore, upgrade your skills and equipment, and uncover the mysteries surrounding the freighter's loss of communication with the base of operations on Earth.

name: UBoat: The Silent Wolf
description: UBOAT: The Silent Wolf is a simulator of a submarine from WWII era, yet different than all you have seen so far. It is a survival sandbox with crew management mechanics while its primary theme is life of German sailors. The boat is their home, but it can become their grave at any time.

name: First Dwarf
description: If there’s one thing dwarves are better at than grooming their beards, it's engineering. Jump into your mech, build a base and explore the crumbled fantasy world in this immersive action RPG.

name: Fable of Sand Paws
description: Sand Paw is an adventurous cat who is looking for treasures! Explore the 3D dioramas, rotate the camera to find hidden locations, move blocks and platforms, solve puzzles, find and collect all the lost treasures!

name: Thirty-One 3D Premium
description: Thirty-One 3D Premium brings a lot of game variants, challenging opponents and environments with great 3D graphics on your PC.You can play in Singleplayer offline or LAN and Online Mode! The full animated Tutorial explains rules of the popular card game step by step.

name: Skye: The Misty Isle
description: A hyper-realistic survival game set on the isle of Skye during the Viking period. Washed ashore you will fight both the elements and the island's natural predators for survival in a bid to find out how you came to be upon its shores.

name: Forest Ranger Simulator
description: Forests are flooded with rubbish! Let’s have a look at the valley you live in - entirely covered with them… It’s a high time you finally hunker down, grab a bin liner and lets your area challenge you - explore it and admire how the view is changing when you take care of it.

name: Uzzuzzu My Pet: Golf Dash - Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Enotria: The Last Song - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition of Enotria: The Last Song includes:

ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK EXTRACT

DIGITAL ARTBOOK EXTRACT

EXCLUSIVE WEAPON SKINS SET

UPGRADE WEAPON MATERIALS

UPGRADE MASK MATERIALS

UPGRADE LINES MATERIALS

EXTRA MIRACLE PESTO

EXTRA HYMN OF VIGOR

EXTRA ARMONIA SAP

name: Mug
description:
Mug is a clicker game where you fill a mug.

It's hot and thirsty. Click and fill the mug. Please!

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Ta 152 H-1 Collector Plane
description: The Ta 152 was the last creation of the German aircraft designer Kurt Tank, which managed to take part in combat operations during the Second World War. This aircraft was the culmination of the evolution of the Fw 190 fighter and Germany's most advanced piston fighter. It was in development for a long time, several years, and appeared at the very end of the war. During the development, several modifications of the original Fw 190 were produced, which finally led to the Ta 152 - the name "Fw" was changed to "Ta" in recognition of the designer's merits.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Dusty Weapon Skin Set
description: Give your arsenal an authentic feel and blend into the desert sands with the Dusty Weapon Skin Set. This skin can be applied to six different weapons. This skin can be applied to six different weapons.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Desert Veteran Weapon Skin Set
description: Show your knowledge of the battlegrounds with the Desert Veteran Weapon Skin Set. This skin can be applied to six different weapons. This skin can be applied to six different weapons.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Protective Gear Set
description: Gear up for chemical warfare and gain the upper hand over your opponents with the Protective Gear Set for Insurgents. This set includes five different cosmetic gear pieces.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Chemical Combat Gear Set
description: Withstand challenging environments and conquer the battlefield with the Chemical Combat Gear Set for the Security team. This set includes five different cosmetic gear pieces.

name: 10-Day Champion
description: With only 10 days to prepare, every decision counts as you mold your chosen champion into a formidable competitor. Engage in turn-based battles against beasts or other combatants.

name: Warframe: Jade Chorus Pack
description: Pierce through suffocating darkness by adding the radiant songstress Warframe, Jade, along with her signature Customizations to your Arsenal!

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - LakePal Bait Boat Pack
description: Take your bait game to the next level with the LakePal Bait Boat! This remote-controlled device lets you deploy bait further from the shore with pin-point precision and control.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Sundarpatan Cosmetic Pack
description: Decorate your weapons, tents, and ground blinds with cosmetics inspired by Sundarpatan Nepal Hunting Reserve. The contents of this pack are cosmetic only.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: SSR Fletchers Crawfords GE C44aci Pack
description: Drive the Australian C44Aci diesel locomotives, in the Crawfords (PHC class), Fletchers/SSR (FIE class), and Southern Shorthaul Railroad (CEY class) liveries, each with multiple weathering levels and custom features.

name: Who Wants to Be A Millionaire: Microsoft Games DLC Pack
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: Microsoft Games

name: Steel Division 2: Reinforcement Pack #14 - Aces
description: Welcome 10 new Aces to Steel Division 2 with the free Reinforcement Pack #14. A mix of original Steel Division: Normandy ‘44 and new legendary soldiers, commanders, and airmen join the fight. Paired with their trademark unit, Aces feature unique camouflage, paint jobs, markings, and portraits.

name: june 18 2024 (White people in China)
description: Adapted from 'Wet Dreams Can Beta Demo' by 'Immortal'

name: Vault of the Void: Developer Supporter Pack
description: An extensive collection of Australian themed cosmetic unlocks, to help support myself and the team, further funding continued development on Vault of the Void!

name: First in... Line?
description: "It's opening night, and our lead star dropped out! Can you memorize these lines REALLY quickly?"

name: Crime Boss: Rockay City - Cagnali's Order
description:
Resist Cagnali’s Order!
A new threat is coming to Rockay City as the police force cooperates with a new rival – Cagnali Industries!

Stop Cagnali’s high-tech army’s rapid advancements before Rockay City becomes a totalitarian dystopia. Fight against a robot army in new big heists with brand new story, enemies, soundtrack and more!

name: Vision Ghost 2
description: This case takes us to a large mansion located deep in the mountains. In this small world almost cut off from the outside, the main leadership of a large company resides. They harbor secrets unknown to outsiders, which will gradually be revealed due to the occurrence of an accidental incident...

name: Two Tone Jam
description: Two Tone Jam was a jam that required participants to combine two different colors, themes, or motifs! It was a speedmap event (~48 hours) using the venerable Copper mod as a base and 9 maps were created.

name: Quizzical
description: In Quizzical, you study randomly-generated nonsense text and are then quizzed on it.

name: Warframe: Jade Shadows
description: Jade Shadows contains significant spoilers for Warframe! To ensure that all Tenno enjoy the best possible experience, we ask that you allow others to complete the Quest at their own pace, and to please be kind. If you’d like to discuss the Quest after playing (and we certainly expect that you will), please use spoiler tags so everyone can experience it as intended. Thanks, Tenno.

name: Truck Simulator USA & ATV Monster Rally Bundle
description: Double the Wheels, Double the Thrills. Two Epic Journeys but just One Bundle: Truck Simulator USA & ATV Monster Rally Bundle!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun - Forges of Corruption Edition
description: Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun - Forges of Corruption Edition is the most complete way to experience the ultimate Warhammer 40,000 homage to retro shooters, including the base game and Forges of Corruption DLC.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online Collection: Gold Road
description:
Pre-purchase now to get immediate access to a new mount and additional rewards at launch.

The Elder Scrolls Online Collection: Gold Road is ideal for adventurers who wish to access all major Chapter zones and quests found across Tamriel. The Collection: Gold Road includes the Gold Road Chapter (available at launch) in addition to the base game AND all previous Chapters (available immediately).

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Deluxe Collection - Gold Road
description:
Pre-purchase now to get immediate access to a new mount and additional rewards at launch.

The Elder Scrolls Online Deluxe Collection: Gold Road is ideal for adventurers who wish to access all major Chapter zones and quests found across Tamriel. The Deluxe Collection: Gold Road includes the Base Game, Gold Road, all previous Chapters (which can be played immediately), and all previous Deluxe in-game items.

name: Monstrosity
description: Monstrosity is a 2.5D action-platformer inspired by classic 8-bit and 16-bit era games. Explore a planet filled with twisting caverns, hideous creatures and horrifying bosses, while using your mutated arms for weapons! Or blast your friends in our epic PvP mode

name: City Find All
description: City find all is an exciting 3D puzzle game for finding objects in a cozy town. There are many objects on the location, there are numerous buildings, benches, signs, and other urban decorations. The player must explore every part of the location to find the necessary items.

name: Eternal Rain
description: Dive down into the ominous world of Eternal Rain, a dark-themed Shoot 'Em Up game that throws you into a relentless onslaught against hordes of nightmarish enemies. Unlock new characters with unqiue powers and survive the everlasting rain.

name: Level Age ni Sugoku Choudo Ii Shima
description:
Level Age ni Sugoku Choudoii Shima is a simulator game published by KONAMI for iOS, Android and web browsers. Level Age ni Choudoii Shima, developed by kagaya, is the original work and is an expanded game.
Currently, the original work is no longer available.

The purpose of the game is to create islands to beat the Final Boss, and to level up characters and train and synthesize companion monsters on the islands.

name: Deep Space Dapper Squad
description: Sin descripción

name: Disney Illusion Island: Mystery in Monoth
description: Curious clues are popping up across Monoth, and Dash Dolphin needs your help to find them. Locate clues, close cases, and solve this brand-new detective mystery.

name: Metal Slug: Attack - Reloaded
description: Metal Slug Attack Reloaded is a remaster of the original Metal Slug Attack. Build the strongest team you can and crush enemy bases with a variety of strategies and hundreds of characters.

name: Kart Heros Ultra
description: A micro Racing game, spanning accross multiple levels. Players can race AI with multiplayer and local support coming soon.

name: Habbo Hotel: Origins
description: Habbo Hotel: Origins is a restored version of the 2005 version of Habbo Hotel with a fresh, community-led approach.

name: Confidential Mission
description: Join the fight and make your mark in the battle for global peace in Confidential Mission.

name: Died
description: Survive amidst colleagues turned into monsters due to a virus leak in this horror game. Explore the 10-floor underground lab to uncover the secrets.

name: Drifto: Infinite Touge
description: No campaign, no cutscenes, just beautifully simple scenery and a whole lot of tyre smoke. How far can you get?

name: Space Planet Invader: Cosmic Power
description: Defend, Build, Conquer Unleash Your Cosmic Power

name: Home: Mother
description: The "HOME" series is a miniature word game based on different native family backgrounds. Explore each room, collect information clues through solving puzzles and finding objects, and infer and restore the protagonist's secrets and life story.

name: The Day Of Survival
description: The Day Of Survival Immerse yourself in a post-apocalyptic world where every decision is crucial. "The Day Of Survival" is a thrilling survival game that challenges players to explore a harsh, unforgiving landscape filled with zombies and enemy soldiers.

name: Neon Fantasy: Mushrooms
description: Neon Fantasy: Mushrooms is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Tropico 6: Tropican Shores
description: A new age is dawning upon Tropico as El Presidente turns toward the great Blue Gold that surrounds its shores: Tropico 6 - Tropican Shores brings you tons of new opportunities to build and expand your island - on the ocean.

name: Espire 1: Sydney Sneakabouts Mission Pack
description: Deploy Espire Model 1 on 10 thrilling Stealth Action missions in the Sydney Sneakabouts Mission Pack. The Sydney Sneakabouts DLC features 2 sprawling environments and adds 10 new missions to Espire 1's ‘Virtual Challenges' game mode and caters to fans of the stealth or ‘all guns blazing' approaches.

name: Physical Spheres
description: Physical Spheres is a physics based puzzle game. The goal is to create chains of similarly colored spheres that connect to positive (+) and negative (-) terminals. At present this is the left and right side of the current game area, but in future updates there will be more elaborate game areas.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Sundarpatan Nepal Hunting Reserve
description: Brave the beauty at the stunning Sundarpatan Nepal Hunting Reserve. Hunt among three distinct climate regions and go in pursuit of 10 new animal species.

name: Daxter
description:
A port of Daxter, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

The game was originally released in 2006 as a spin-off of the Jak and Daxter series.

name: Ghosthunter
description: Playing the role of a novice policeman, Lazarus Jones, we enter a world full of ghosts and phenomena. In the world of the game belonging to the genre of survival horror horror initiated by the series Alone in the Dark.

name: Get off Work
description: After coming home from work, the usual atmosphere is different. Suddenly, someone appears and starts giving you terrifying and strange tasks.

name: Double Play
description: "Double Play" is a visual novel for adults only. A young slacker named David moves into his late grandmother's house, where he meets the charming female neighbors, but one innocent prank turns his life upside down.

name: Guns & Bots
description: Fight unstoppable robot horde on the arena, survive, unlock new gears, weapons and characters. Test your skill!

name: Finch
description: This game is about finding mistakes by comparing the correct room with the wrong room. There are 6 stages in total, and each stage has 10 mistakes!

name: Build A Friend
description: Build A Friend is a runner and a management adventure. In the runner, you create a robot following the sample on each level. Each time you should choose the right door to win at the end of a level. At the factory, you manage repair slots and upgrade them to fix damaged robots.

name: 8minSurvival
description: It is a top-down shooting game where you have to survive for 8 minutes from pursuing enemies to clear the game.

name: Listen, Think, Meow!
description: Listen, Think, Meow! is an audiobook with missing words. If you can't find the word then its time to start meowing for the hint. Oh and if you are struggling you might need a "meow".

name: Sleep Simulator
description: Welcome to the world of "Sleep Simulator," where you will immerse yourself in the fascinating and hyper-realistic world of sleep.

name: Z Rush
description: Z Rush is an exciting strategic 3D game where your task is to place zombies in such a way that they can destroy all the turrets on the level.

name: Medival Hustle
description: Madival Hustle is a captivating 3D medival-quest game, where you will immerse yourself in a world of fantasy landscapes, where every hill and castle hides its own secrets and adventures. Follow the storyline completing the quests and find out what awaits you in the finale.

name: Insert Item Apocalypse
description: Insert Item Apocalypse - interactive 3D puzzle in genre "find and click". Explore a world full of many details, conveying the spirit of the aftermath of a major man-made disaster.

name: Apocalypse Delivery Service
description: Apocalypse Delivery Service is an exciting survival and adventure game. You will enter a post-apocalyptic world where you play as a courier delivering packages. But don't think it will be easy! Your task is to find necessary items, survive, and most importantly, escape from the city.

name: Hunter Legends
description: RPG game and Open World,in this game ,you kill monsters and beast of prey，and some small games can play.

name: Kuiper Belt Survivor
description: Kuiper belt survivor is an arcade style bullet heaven, where every run is endless. It brings a unique spin to the bullet heaven genre by making every part of the players weapon arsenal customizable with well over 10,000 unique weapons to build, and unique stats for every enemy.

name: Sweet Forest
description: Sweet Forest - is a simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game with relaxing music accompaniment. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girl's photo in the gallery.

name: Lunia Record
description: Originally an ordinary adventure life, after meeting a problem person, the brother and sister stepped into a magnificent and extraordinary world.

name: Once in Hell
description: Once in Hell: I tried to create a game where i union History,Horror,Riddle and Parkour. In game u can use: Inventory,torch,flashlight and everything that can help you to survive. I am sure that, time you'll spend on a game will be enjoyable.

name: Random Hero Defense
description: Block enemies with randomly generated heroes Survive until the last round and clear the game. Defeat enemies and use the gold you earn to produce more heroes and become stronger.

name: Goo Go
description: Test your skills, patience, and nerves in a game where one mistake will send you back to the beginning. Oh, and welcome to "Goo Go"!

name: Frame Breaker
description: Frame Breaker is a top-down roguelite precision platformer.

name: An Agonized Mind
description: An Agonized Mind is a minimalist, survival horror, 2D top down shooter. Explore corridors filled with mutilated human experiments as you run and shoot your way to freedom. Gather resources and upgrade yourself, choosing to be robotic or human as you fight horrors of the compound.

name: Arena of Block Puzzle
description: A puzzle game The game has no upper limit on points, no time limit, no operational requirements, just thinking about it As the score increases, the difficulty will also become increasingly difficult. Come challenge your brain's limits!

name: Summoned By Accident
description: Summoned by Accident is a text based rpg focused mainly on m/m content with character driven plot. In it, you explore and run into inhabitants of the world. Some friendly, some foe. Inspired by other text based games and some videos.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun - Forges Of Corruption
description: You had a hell of a blast purging the heretics? Grab your holy chainsword, trusted bolter, and prepare for another adrenaline-pumping shootout, cause your favorite Ultramarine is back ! Bring Boltgun’s bloodfest to another level with its new DLC: Forges of Corruption. Dive into a brand new campaign consisting of 5 levels with varied environments inspired by the grim dark lore of Warhammer 40,000.

name: Chocolate Factory
description:
Build your dream Chocolate Factory among candy cane forests and gumdrop hills to produce the tastiest sweets.
A delicious first-person factory automation game with a little exploration and combat.
Confectionary conveyor belt heaven awaits!

name: Small Hero Survive
description: Small Hero Survive is a single player vampire like monster building and survival game. Here, you will choose characters and weapons, build your own village. Use different weapons to unlock character skills and defeat more enemies.

name: Chaos Brave Village
description: This game is a turn-based strategy adventure where you play as a king's trusted confidant sent to a remote village to investigate a mysterious power. Search for clues, recruit heroes, confront unknown enemies, and uncover the truth behind the "inaccessible place."

name: Forest of Fear
description: On a mission to explore a secret island discovered by the military, your plane crashes, leaving you as the sole survivor. Now, on the Island of the Condemned, your only concern is to survive and escape at any cost.

name: Starship Troopers: Terran Command - Urban Onslaught
description: A ferocious Arachnid onslaught has swept through the city’s suburbs, completely overwhelming local police forces. Never before have they faced such a massive and meticulously orchestrated assault.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Highway Patrol Expansion
description: Discover the Police Simulator: Patrol Officers expansion and extend your patrol area! Engage in intense highway chases and use fast-paced pit maneuvers to tactically stop fleeing suspects who are in violation of the law, and enjoy a more dynamic police simulation experience.

name: 1Bit Castle: Remake
description: Dive into 1BIT CASTLE: REMAKE, a strategic action-packed tower defense game. Choose heroes and perks to fight off evil monsters. Enjoy captivating pixel art while protecting your treasures in this addictive adventure with endless mode!

name: They Can Fart
description: Play as a one-eyed farting creature and glide across the stars in this 3v3 online competitive gravity based multiplayer game, where you jump between planets, dodge other player’s bullet, and plant seeds to make your team win.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Gold Edition
description: Welcome to the Brighton Police Department! Enjoy a comprehensive experience with the Gold Edition! This includes the main game, the brand-new Highway Patrol Expansion, and the Garage Bundle containing all previously published car DLCs.

name: Swamp Up
description: Jump between mushrooms, collect power-ups and break records while exploring your own path through a procedurally loaded map in this innovative endless runner with no lane limitations. Be fast, precise, and skillful to avoid all of its dangers. And most importantly, never touch the water.

name: Convento
description: A story about growing up online and dealing with IRL updates.A look back at the past 2 decades of gaming that will make you think about the good, the bad, and the ones left behind.

name: Ghost Ascension
description: Challenge hordes of ghosts, create builds, and unlock permanent upgrades! Ghost Ascension is a 2D rogue-like with a strong progression system. At the end of each wave of enemies, choose the card that best fits your build.

name: The Lord of Time
description: You find yourself on a strange planet known as Earth and must follow the orders of the Zenti.

name: DNF Duel: DLC 5 - Nen Master
description: Nen Master is the 5th DLC character for DNF Duel and final character in the game's Season Pass,

name: Pawafuru Puroyakyu 2024-2025
description: Sin descripción

name: Immortals Must Die
description:
Indie Roquelite 2d

Kill hordes of demons as you unlock new items and skills, complete quests, upgrade your equipment and discover different ways of getting through the challenges that await you.

name: White Cat Town Mystery
description: White Cat Town Mystery is a visual novel/adventure game about an anthropomorphic cat named Lumi. Help him explore atmospheric and magical town, meet old friends again, make hard choices, and go through supernatural challenges. What you choose decides the fate of the town—and Lumi himself!

name: Be My Horde
description: Be My Horde is a top-down 2D survival roguelite. Become a formidable necromancess, and make your enemies a resource! Resurrect each fallen foe, create massive hordes of the undead, and use the harvested souls to enhance your skills, growing more powerful with each death PRAISE BE MORIANA!

name: Push The Cat with WASD
description: A cat-pushing puzzle game where narratives are puzzle levels. With an emotional story and a little bit of 4th wall breaking. By pushing the cat, you are pushing the cat to think, to remember why they are stuck in this game...

name: Nebula Flow
description: Nebula Flow is a music game where you follow the melodic trail charted by your dog across colorful pixel art landscapes. Stock up on notes to power your canine companion to the end of each song!

name: The Big Blue
description: A rouge top-down bullet screen shooting game

name: Whispering Lane
description: Uncover the dark secrets of the abandoned house on Whispering Lane in this psychological horror game. Navigate through perilous twists, where each turn reveals a blend of horror and mystery. Can you unearth the truth before darkness consumes you?

name: Hallways
description: You must survive the night in this immersive survival horror. Utilize your limited power to keep the attacker from getting to you from one of the hallways surrounding you. Can you survive?

name: Jrago II: Guardians of Eden
description: Jrago II Guardians of Eden is a Multiplayer Co-Op METROIDVANIA style 2D Platforming Action-Adventure Role Playing Game. The darkness has once again returned, and this time Jrago teams up with his fellow guardians as they slay the evil demons and bring back the light!

name: Sugar Lust
description: Embark on a journey through the realm of the cake. As you progress through a series of intricately designed puzzles, you'll encounter a diverse cast of charming heroes and heroines. Upgrade your characters and prepare to face off against the ruler of the land, the Demon Goddess

name: Midnight Margo
description: A narrative-driven roleplaying adventure with a touch of absurdity

name: Tradesman: Deal to Dealer
description: Shake in your cart, buy here, sell there, protect your goods, and help your family.

name: Escape from the Room of the Sex Dolls
description: Escape from a room full of puzzles with Aicha, the breast-expanding robot erotic service doll! A new combination of classic escape room gameplay and stunning 3D chest animation. Will you be able to solve all the puzzles and get out of the room safely?

name: Wacky Wonderland Wollop: A 3D Platformer for the Ages Game of the Year All Time: The Game
description: A 3D Platformer 3PShooter Dialogue Driven Soulslike with RPG elements and free Unity assets. What it doesn't have in Art Direction, it makes up in charm, mechanics, features, and very funny smart political commentary that says alot about are society.

name: Age of Wonders 4: Eldritch Realms
description: The Age of Wonders 4: Eldritch Realms expansion opens portals to realms filled with arcane marvels and unspeakable horrors. New forces threaten the rule of the Godir of Magehaven. New story content, strange monsters, new racial forms, magical realms and locations bring a new dimension to the game.

name: Universal Conquest
description: 4X/Grand Strategy/RTS Hybrid Space Simulation based on principles - and developed in consultancy with - alien contactees.

name: Be My Horde
description: Be My Horde is a top-down 2D survival roguelite. Become a formidable necromancess, and make your enemies a resource! Resurrect each fallen foe, create massive hordes of the undead, and use the harvested souls to enhance your skills, growing more powerful with each death. PRAISE BE MORIANA!

name: Still Wakes the Deep
description: 1975. Disaster strikes the Beira D oil rig off the coast of Scotland. Navigate the collapsing rig to save your crew from an otherworldly horror on the edge of all logic and reality.

name: GoKaDu
description: GoKaDu is a retro simulator of a role-playing card game of the 80s - "Govno". Play cards with the ghosts of GoKaDu castle, use the game chat and enjoy the mystical atmosphere of this amazing game. The game has rude profanity and a lot of joy and fun.

name: The Adventures of Nerdstan
description: Join Nerdstan In His Ultimate Adventures to save the NerdDom. Defeat Enemies, Collect Coins, Navigate Platforms and Face Powerful Bosses.

name: Fantasy Survival in Another World
description: "Fantasy Survival in Another World" is a role-playing game with Japanese-style fantasy elements, combining survival, ARPG, and building mechanics. Explore every corner of the map, discover new locations and quests, and collect various resources and treasures.

name: Little Kingdoms
description: Little Kingdoms is a medieval real time strategy game with stylistic low poly graphics and relaxing music. As a new Lord, you will start with one territory. Your goal is to conquer the neighboring kingdoms and grow your empire.

name: Go-Go Town!
description: Plan, Build...Prosper? As mayor, it’s up to you to breathe life back into this rundown town. Construct shops, hire staff, automate deliveries with couriers, and attract tourists to town, all while managing infrastructure and avoiding catastrophes! Who said being mayor was going to be easy…

name: Pax Dei
description: Welcome to a vast, social sandbox MMO inspired by the legends of the medieval era. Here, myths are real, ghosts exist, and magic is unquestioned. Join thousands of players as you explore the land, build your home, forge your reputation, and craft your own stories. What world will you make?

name: Interregnum Chronicles: False Prophet
description: A tactical, turn-based survival game. The world just ended, almost everyone mysteriously died and now it's snowing in California. Your child is missing, but you know where to go. You will never make it alone and there’s only one way to convince others to help. You have to become the False Prophet.

name: Time Hoppers: The Silk Road
description: Time Hoppers: The Silk Road is a time-traveling, mind-expanding, action-adventure RPG for all ages! Embark on an epic journey through the Golden Age of the Silk Road and save real scientists who changed the world. The enigmatic evil Dr. Fasid has sinister schemes up his sleeve, though.

name: Thistlemine
description: Thistlemine is a puzzle RPG that tells a story about the work that takes place within an Anomalis Exclusion Zone – a hostile environment where space and time are warped, and the thick miasma suffocates those trapped within.

name: Coreborn
description: A social survival sandbox game set in the world of Ultracore, the game combines three major pillars: a survival sandbox (the world of Tormentosia), a social hub (Coreheim, the location of the Ultracore) and adventures (diverse action experiences).

name: Atomic Escape
description: Uncover a profound secret conspiracy solving puzzles and cracking codes to access the confidential files from a secret space travel project in this first person point and click adventure game set in a beautiful mid century atomic age ranch.

name: XueFeng Mountain: Secret Opera
description: In the Spring Festival of 2005, the blizzard in Xuefeng mountain trapped the drama troupe performing in the village. At the same time, there was a homicide during the performance. Unlike the nervous members of the drama troupe, the villagers were afraid of a more terrible existence than the homicide

name: Bule Form
description: 《蓝色形态(Bule Form)》是一款BL向角色扮演。以都市为主要活动地点，在都市与战区之间辗转。在战斗中打败你的敌人，破解谜题推进事件发展。

name: #Blud
description: Save your friends, fight off the vampire apocalypse, and survive the horrors of freshman field hockey practice in #Blud a delightfully zany animated dungeon crawler that blurs the line between action RPGs and hyperkinetic 90s cartoons.

name: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker HD Randomizer
description: Randomizer mod for the Wii U remaster of Wind Waker by SuperDude88.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Season Pass

name: Brilliantcrypto
description:
Brilliantcrypto is a PC game where the main aim is to mine for digital gemstones. Players enter mines and use all of the tools at their disposal, including a pickaxe, a gemstone detector, dynamite, and even the adorable company mascot Rupert!

To acquire a mine and get started, users need to own an NFT pickaxe, but it is possible to borrow one in-game and mine in someone else's mine, so it is free to download and get started.

Users can trade the gemstones they have mined on the market for cryptocurrency, making this a play-to-earn title. They can also earn the BRIL token while mining, which can be reused in game to make mining more efficient, or exported and traded on marketplaces.

Other actions include searching for mines, upgrading your pickaxe and mines, and viewing the gemstones you've mined in a high-quality inspection experience.

Up to 6 players can play in the same mine.

description: Unlocking the character allows you to use the character to play the levels in the game and unlock weapons and skill effects of the character. You can also use this character to combine with other heroes to trigger more interesting combos.

description: Jack&Bob Remastered is supposed to demonstrate an alternative dimension of Sonic The Hedgehog. The game is based off Sonic 1 and 2.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - Mitama Dance of Miracles
description:
Additional downloadable content that increases the spawn rate of "Nigi Mitama", demons that drop items that give the protagonist Glory, points needed to learn new Miracles.

*There is still a low chance of Mitama spawning even without this DLC.
*You can revert the spawn rate mid-game from the Options menu.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - Mitama Dance of Wealth
description:
Additional downloadable content that increases the spawn rate of "Saki Mitama", demons that drop items that can be sold for Macca.

*There is still a low chance of Mitama spawning even without this DLC.
*You can revert the spawn rate mid-game from the Options menu.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - Mitama Dance of EXP
description:
Additional downloadable content that increases the spawn rate of "Kushi Mitama", demons that drop items that give the protagonist EXP, and "Ara Mitama," demons that drop items that give ally demons EXP.

*There is still a low chance of Mitama spawning even without this DLC.
*You can revert the spawn rate mid-game from the Options menu.

name: An Aunt After My Own Heart
description: Discovering his beautiful young aunt is engaged to be married, a nephew takes matters into his own hands.

name: Hatsumonogatari
description:
Which of the four heroines will you choose?

Detarou is enrolling into a private school, the formerly girls-only "Lovely Academy", which has only become co-ed starting this year. Deepen your romance with the heroines via interacting with them after-school! Which of these heroines will become your first love?

name: Golden Ball
description: Playing this game will give you the experience of feeling like a child and competing in a little athletic competition. You may also learn to understand a little more about how molecules feel. If you are looking for a game for a change of pace from other games, try this one.

name: Broke in Isekai
description: Broke and down on your luck, you enter a portal to another world, only to find out that your fortunes there aren't any better. Broke in another world, you have to find a way to survive in a corrupt city. At least there are beautiful women of various fantastical races to build relationships with.

name: Synthetic Soul: Reset
description: Synthetic Soul: Reset is a remaster of our first game in the series, remade in our new engine. Discover the secret of your robot, and change the world.

name: BoyKisser Clicker
description: Click on the Boykisser and take over the world.

name: Camera
description: A Yume Nikki fangame for the Dream Diary Jam 8.

name: Tsurikkuma
description: Tsurikkuma is one of the games that can be played on Nico Nico Live.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - DLC All-in-One
description:
The DLC All-in-One bundle set includes the following:
• DLC Content - Mitama Dance of Wealth
• DLC Content - Mitama Dance of EXP
• DLC Content - Mitama Dance of Miracles
• Demon Subquest - Sakura Cinders of the East
• Demon Subquest - Holy Will and Profane Dissent

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - Safety Difficulty
description: Adds the "Safety" difficulty option, suggested for beginners or those who want to enjoy the story. This difficulty is recommended for those who have little experience with RPGs.

name: Monster Hunter Stories Deluxe Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Crypt Stalker: Happy Edition

description: A small town close to the beach. Summer vacation has just begun. While you were enjoying your coffee in this cafe, you fell asleep without realizing it. When you wake up again you find yourself locked in a basement. What will happen there?

name: Fix the Robot!
description: With a limited number of levels, every repair task is a testament to your skill and ingenuity.

name: Startup Quest Bakery
description: Embark on a brief entrepreneurial journey to establish and manage a socially responsible bakery. Obtain permits, prepare the space, choose your equipment, and produce various breads. Aim for profitability while positively impacting society and the environment.

name: In Service of the Queen
description: Embark in this paced time and resource management where you coordinate the workers, build and collect resources to perform the task, In Service of the Queen!

name: Agnostiko Origins
description:
Welcome to 1890's steampunk Philippines.
where there are mysterious monsters roaming around manila
What you will encounter here is based on Philippine Mythology
You will play the role of the "man in the red scarf"
explore the mysterious mansion and discover the truth behind this nightmare
Inspired by 90s 16bit art style
from the characters to the background everything is created
in style using pixel art like the 4th generation consoles.
A Filipino Metroidvania game that features Filipino Folklore like Aswang, Kapre, Tikbalang, Manananggal, duwende, whitelady and more.

name: The Great Adventures of Nedmapagmahal
description: Action rage game that will test your limits

name: Tour de Drone
description: Tour de Drone - Race Your drone around A.I. enhanced 3D photorealistic holographic paintings of locations from around the world.

name: Nowhere Near

name: Jaro Adventures
description: Jaro adventures is a 2d action/adventure platformer. You play as a character Jaro and through levels try to defeat enemies that get in your way. Try to collect as many coins as those will buy you character upgrades.

name: Getting There
description: Getting There is a narrative adventure game telling the story of the world after what is only known as The Collision. After the death of her lover Kirsten, Lauren gets in her van and journeys across the strange and quiet world in search of civilisation.

name: Hentai Games Collection
description: Meet fantastic girls in the biggest bundle of the hentai games along with all DLCs.

name: Acrylic Nails!
description: Sin descripción

name: Monsterburg
description: What's better than a quintuple bloody burger, or nuggets and fries fried in human fat? You wanna taste? You bet. Just don't forget to wear diapers. If you can eat everything on our menu and make it to the toilet, our monsters are sure to scare the hell out of you !

name: Learn to Play Vol. 3: Mice Love Cheese
description:
We all know that mice really love cheese.

Guide the little mouse through 30 short levels and help her collect all the cheese pieces on the way. Watch out for tiny holes in the floor. If your mouse falls inside, you have to start the level from the beginning.

Complete all 30 levels for victory. A short and fun experience that can be enjoyed by players of all ages.

name: A House 4 Alesa
description:
Rpg Maker horror about a social worker trapped in a house of horrors.
4th game in the series (excluding the remake) and direct sequel to A House for Alesa 3

name: Cazzarion: Portal Pilot

description: Embark on an epic adventure to an ancient, mysterious island where your escape room puzzle skills will be put to the test. In Venari, uncover the secrets hidden on the island and discover the legendary Venari artefact.

There are 66 levels to conquer across 11 different game modes, secrets to discover along the way, bonus modes to unlock... you'll be surprised how much can be packed into one little spec.

name: Spin the Book
description: Sin descripción

name: Warfront Tactics: Battlefield Chronicles Battle Simulator
description: Unleash the commander within in Warfront Tactics - Battlefield Chronicles Battle Simulator, a captivating physics-based strategy game that thrusts you into the heart of epic warfare. Strategically allocate your resources, craft a formidable army, and outmaneuver your opponents in intense battles governed by realistic physics. Witness the chaos and spectacle of combat as your meticulously planned strategies unfold on the battlefield. Every decision carries weight, every encounter presents a challenge, and every victory is hard-won.

name: Catch Thieves
